def rearrange_sentence(words):
    sentence = ' '.join(words)
    sentence -= '.'
    sentence = sentence.capitalize()
    return sentence

def rearrange_sentence(words):
    sentence = ' '.join(words)
    sentence += ''
    sentence = sentence.capitalize()
    return sentence
